# 1 Getting Started

## 1.1 Install and Load 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readxl, SmartEDA, easystats, gtsummary)
```
:::


## 1.2 Import Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
car_resale <-
  read_xls("data/ToyotaCorolla.xls", "data")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(car_resale)
```
